definition: Baekdu or Changbai mountains 長白山|长白山, volcanic mountain range between Jilin province and North Korea, prominent in Manchu and Korean mythology

sentences.english: It is also mentioned in South Korea's national anthem.
sentences.chinese: 南韓的國歌中也提到了白頭山。

sentences.english: The Rhododendron Forest on Baitoushan Yangyuchang called by local Yi people is composed of this species mostly.
sentences.chinese: 流域洋芋廠白頭山杜鵑林主要優勢種類即爲本變種。
